website_summaries.verdict: Iconic vintage Coca-Cola theme is a fun addition to a party with the same accessories and price point as similar models.
pros: Coordinating steel towel bar, lid grips, and hardware for locking caster wheels
Comes in multiple colors, so you can choose your favorite throwback Coca-Cola theme
cons: Some reports that legs are flimsy and occasional hardware malfunctions
Drinks not always chilled or cold due to some insulation issues

customer_reviews.title: Decorative and perfect addition for parties
customer_reviews.text: Everyone comments at how cool this looks. I use this for when I have parties and place bottles and cans of sodas and beers for my guest. It can hold a lot. I use it mainly indoors and the ice will last all day. The assembly was easy for my husband but there was a bolt already where the can opener should be that we had a hard time removing. We did scratch the paint trying to remove this bolt but when we put the can opener in place, you can’t see the scratches made. The cooler looks really good and with the wheels make it easy to move around. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: "The Coolest Cooler"
customer_reviews.text: This cute cooler in true Coca Cola red color arrived packaged very well and looked exactly as pictured and looks very high quality. The Coca Cola emblem are not stickers, they're metal and part of the cooler construction. It seemed a little smaller than expected but the size still works. If I had to order again I would maybe have ordered the 80 quart size for a little more storage but then again the construction looked less quality from the picture for the 80 quart size. Great purchase to keep beer and sodas cold and to display on the patio for a conversation piece with its retro look!
customer_reviews.author: Dee Lighted

customer_reviews.title: Bright, fun and functional!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute if you love red (my fave), love nostalgia, and need a grown-up cooler on your lanai when you host friends over. This is perfect! I assembled in 30min. and has also ordered the suggested outdoor cover for it, to keep it protected. I’m really happy with this purchase. The exterior was a little scratched from the packaging which I believe others mentioned too. I’ll post pics so you can see. That doesn’t bother me because if it’s an outside cooler and with boys around, scuffs are the least that’s gonna happen to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but arrived with damage to th lid
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS COOLER ! It does cost more than all the other coolers on stands but I am sure that is because of the embossed Coca Cola brand on it. My only real issue is it arrived with damage to the lid (dent) . The only way to resolve is to send the whole thing back apparently. What a pain in the butt. I wish I could just get a replacement lid.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but not really a good cooler for keeping drinks cold.
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice but not practical as a real cooler. Not well insulated so with that said twenty pounds of ice over canned and bottled drinks in a shaded area only lasted about three hours. Cleaned it up and now the cooler is a cool conversation piece. The colors are nice and the assembly was easy. Nicely packaged as well. My big disappointment is the function is far from what expected. I have decided not to return it because it as I said looks very cool. Actually store dry products inside.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Fun cooler!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute addition to our game room! It’s a good height and has features for easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this cooler
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is so neat. The lettering is actually embossed in the metal, unlike most others we have seen. The legs are sturdy, the red is a PERFECT Coca Cola Red. For the price and the shipping speed, this is up there honestly as one of our favorite Amazon purchases ever. We have had it now for a few weeks and absolutely love it. GET IT!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent and cost twice as much at the coke store
customer_reviews.author: Walmart joe

customer_reviews.title: Coca Cola Cooler
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooler. It’s the perfect height. I ordered it this morning and it arrived this afternoon. It was easy to put together and looks awesome. I gave 4 stars because there is a dent on the front. It’s not a deal breaker for me, I still love it. It will be great for parties.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Dugan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty , with some negatives
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking cooler. Two negatives though .... its not well insulated , and one of the wheels broke off in less than a month , as a welded nut broke loose in the leg . Real pretty looking though .
customer_reviews.author: duane Plikunas

customer_reviews.title: Love the Styling but the Sturdiness is Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this in May of this year and used it several times over the summer. Like I said in the title, love the styling, but the sturdiness is terrible. Two of the legs have ripped themselves from the base of the cooler, I guess it will still work if set up on another table or stand. The legs need to be supported at the bottom similar to other products.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: It's lightweight and easy to move around
customer_reviews.text: It's lightweight and easy to move around, but it maintains an extremely cold temperature for hours after you place the ice inside. It was easy to assemble and looks great on my back patio near the pool. It also holds a large amount of cans/bottles.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly legs and lid
customer_reviews.text: Loved the appearance of this cooler for our back yard, but have been very disappointed by the wobbly leg and lid. One leg no matter how tightly it is attached is wobbly. The plate attached to needs to be better soddered to actual chest. Also the lid does not fit securely. As much as I love how it looks cooler not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Love this Cooler!!
customer_reviews.text: I do not write many reviews but I had to for this product. I love this cooler, easy to assemble, looks amazing and holds a ton of ice and drinks and keeps them cold for a very long time. I love the retro cream and red look...would definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Todd N.

customer_reviews.title: other wise we received many compliments as to how useful and pretty it was
customer_reviews.text: my wife order it...i thought it was expensive.....but Im cheap....ha..ha.... other wise we received many compliments as to how useful and pretty it was......
customer_reviews.author: lou

customer_reviews.title: Coca Cola cooler
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of it. Keeps drinks cool and for along time. We did have two legs that had dents in them but just put them in the back since I wanted it here for the 4th of July. This is why I gave four stars all overall but otherwise very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: sheila lewis

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I filled it with house hold necessities for my son and his fiancee's wedding shower. It was a great hit!
customer_reviews.author: B. Rocha

customer_reviews.title: Coke and a smile
customer_reviews.text: Took about 10 minutes to put together but its totally awsome.
customer_reviews.author: AXEL RAMOS

customer_reviews.title: Really nice.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, sturdy, keeps drinks cold. It looks wonderful in our lanai.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda King

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great buy!!! Easy to assemble. Ice stayed in the cooler over the weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my collection
customer_reviews.text: It looks amazing but not made very well for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Christman

customer_reviews.title: COCA COLA COOLER STAND
customer_reviews.text: Just received this item yesterday. Easy assembly and looks so great on my patio. Can't wait to use it for my bbq's with family and friends. A must have!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: This cooler keeps ice a long time.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact it keeps ice a long time. It is a little small for parties.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, but more of a decorative piece.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this cooler, but it is not well made. It was hard to assemble. They don't give you enough room to use the Allen key. I also wouldn't leave it outside, but it is pretty and we will make it work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and functional. easy to assemble. not so sturdy bc a mix of plastic and metal. we use to hold sodas.
customer_reviews.author: azion77

customer_reviews.title: Cold Beverages!
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive and well made. Easy to assemble and a great addition to parties with friends. Hope it stays in good condition for a long time. Liked it enough to buy another one for our son-in-law
customer_reviews.author: Richard L Guilfoile

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely disappointed with my order one of the legs was not welded to the base properly, I put it together only to have it fall over and completely break off luckily my husband is going to repair it so I can use it but WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS ITEM!
customer_reviews.author: Betty Mayorga

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful addition to our backyard. Couldn't be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: George M

customer_reviews.title: Quality made
customer_reviews.text: Quality made, holds ice for days. Easy to assemble, rolls easily fully loaded. Great for outside parties.
customer_reviews.author: Ramundo

customer_reviews.title: Looks like rust or bad paint
customer_reviews.text: Looks like rust or bad paint. I have no confidence this will hold up. Also had scratches on a leg.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Not what it stated in ad galvanized! Not real galvanized. It’s rusting!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Pettit

customer_reviews.title: Cooler than cool
customer_reviews.text: Bought this lovely cooler just in time for the 4th of July weekend. It’s sturdy. Easy to assemble and delivered on time. It’s a sweet accent piece and my neighbors love it. I recommend if you want something not so big not so small cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Look somewhere else
customer_reviews.text: Assembled the unit and put bottles and ice in the unit. Noticed the lid was loose . Found that there was no seal from the lid to the unit. The side of the unit is bulged out . I’m very disappointed with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: tim evans

customer_reviews.title: Coke Bottle and Can cooler on wheels.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Went together pretty quickly. Holds enough for a deck party. Very stylish and Mobile.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Quigley

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy This!
customer_reviews.text: The lid was damaged and many of the parts were defective. SO SO DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful ice cart.
customer_reviews.text: This item is so beautiful! A little hard to assemble because one srew is located inside de legs. Sturdiness is nice but legs don't seems to support heavy loads. I will be back for more reviews in this item. But I am so in love...
customer_reviews.author: Iris Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We ordered our cooler just in time for our daughters graduation party and we love it. The quality seems good and sturdy and was very easy to assemble. It looks great on our patio.
customer_reviews.author: Cher Smith

customer_reviews.title: Warped
customer_reviews.text: It warped on one side after using it one time.
customer_reviews.author: c. berry

customer_reviews.title: Nice-ish
customer_reviews.text: The quality could have been a "little" better, but overall a decent unit. Nice retro addition to the patio.
customer_reviews.author: Radboy

customer_reviews.title: Too cute
customer_reviews.text: Soon cute and not huge. Just the right size. Easy clean. Looks great on the deck of the shore house
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Best gift for a guy who loves BBQing
customer_reviews.text: The best gift idea. I got it for my husband on his first Father’s Day and he loved it! Great compliment to the BBQ grill.
customer_reviews.author: TKJ

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is just great, it takes me back a few years, like 50's. very well made and a great coating job. Thanks for such a wonderful simple cooler.
customer_reviews.author: David Lockwood

customer_reviews.title: I love my cooler!
customer_reviews.text: It’s larger than I had expected which was amazing. The cooler is so cute and ads an ambiance to my deck. Received so many compliments too! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Happily surprised
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived quickly and is even nicer in person. I don't believe the pictures do it justice. I got this for a gift but may very well buy one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: jason young

customer_reviews.title: Lid Warped
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice. Doesn’t keep Ice very long and the kid warped within one week of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: 66 Drive In Theatre

customer_reviews.title: Retro and beautiful highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful touch to our backyard when we're by the pool would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: It is great!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a friends Birthday Present -- it absolutely made his whole day perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice but...
customer_reviews.text: Nice but lots of scratches on the exterior silver metallic covering. It's brand new but doesn't look it...
customer_reviews.author: JBra

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price. It is very flimsy and it had some scratches on it. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Brian L Hester

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great - Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble - works and looks high quality - everyone loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris D'Errico

customer_reviews.text: This product is great but it came damaged. The corner of the top is smashed in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The cooler came warped from the factory. Its pushed out at the top and the lid doesn't fit correctly.
customer_reviews.author: J Max

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler, well worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: This cooler kept my items cold for 6 days with 1 bag of ice. It looks great and guests love it as much as as I do. Everyone asks me where I got it from.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied customer

product_meta.title: Leigh Country CP 98111 Cream and Red 60 Qt. Coca-Cola Rolling Cooler, Cream & Red
product_meta.description: Color:Cream & RedGet the party rolling with our Leigh Country CP 98111 Cream and Red 60 Qt. Coca-Cola Rolling Cooler! This officially licensed Coca-Cola® cooler is a decorative solution for storing the drinks you plan to serve for your festivities. The removable double lid allows you to fill the insulated poly liner with ice and beverages when the party calls for a round. Additionally, the interior compartment of this 60 qt. cooler has ample volume, so you can keep up with your thirsty guests. Featuring a design inspired by the iconic Coca-Cola logo, this whimsical icebox is a union of classic charm and modern-day function. If you are serving brews in old-fashioned bottles, it comes with a built-in bottle opener and cap catcher. For an added touch of convenience, the steel bar offers a place for you to hang a towel. This retro cooler has four casters for easy transport, and two of them can lock so the cooler stays in place when unattended. You can easily drain the melted ice after the party's over by pulling out the included plug.
feature_bullets: Powder-coated Coke bottle opener and cap catcher
Four casters, two of which lock
Included drain with plug, attached with chain

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars187 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
